popularityCurve.label: the biggest difference between dark knight and batman begins is batman was entirely shot without anamorphic lenses it's all made in cinemascope the majority of dark knight was shot in cinemascope but a substantial proportion of it originated in imax format and we did all the post production in imax resolution a major r amp d effort
